[CBM] Shining Hearts 1-12 Complete (Dual Audio) [BDRip-720p-8bit]

Rick lives on the island of Windaria, inhabited by various races such as elves and beast-people.
Amnesiac, he is rescued by Airy, Amil, and Neris, and starts to work at their bakery.
But when the red moon rises and the deathly wind blows, they are all overwhelmed by a series of strange events.
Source: ANN
